description: SEI-curated list of MDC/FDC hybrid candidate payloads for modular rescue of IL-33-mediated COPD pathophysiology. Each entry is logic-validated and designed for inclusion in the χ1 construct or next-gen variants.

candidates.mechanism: Binds IL-33 at ST2 interface with partial occupancy, reducing overactivation
Inhibits inflammasome activation threshold beyond defined TNF level
Delivers selenium ion to activate keratinocyte and club cell regeneration genes
Aryl hydrocarbon receptor modulation to suppress IL-17A/IL-22
candidates.delivery: Inhaled co-agent with local lung targeting
candidates.activation_trigger: IL-17A > 0.8 baseline or high neutrophilic signature

candidates.mechanism: Logic-controlled delivery of MMP-10 analog to prevent fibrosis
candidates.delivery: Prodrug form with MMP-gated release logic
candidates.activation_trigger: TGF-β > 1.2 baseline and collagen type I > 2x

sei_recommendation.formulation note: All candidates are modular and may be layered or swapped dynamically for next-gen χ2 variants.
